entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug]: `-getProperty` shows workloads update message #37520
  • [NETE2ESDK] [Regression] With .NET 9 SDK installed, it should return that the tool was successfully installed when the tool was installed globally. #37501
    8.0.2xx

Closed

  • Dotnet format fails with EnforceCodeStyleInBuild enabled in 7.0.200 #30742
  • AnalysisLevel `preview` is broken #35932
  • dotnet gloabl tool can not be start after uprade to dotnet sdk 8.0 on Ubuntu(WSL) #37017
  • [NETE2ESDK] With .NET 9 SDK installed, it should not be an unhandled exception when intalling tools that don't exist. #37123

PullRequests

Created

  • Update minimum VS version to 17.8 in 8.0.2xx #37517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix sln add for duplicate projects under different paths with same root #37516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove pinning from xdt #37518
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 22.1.4 to 22.5.0 in /eng/dependabot #37031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Dedup version for workload version subcommand Fixes #35920 #36085
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable TerminalLogger by default for .NET 9 SDKs #37492
    untriaged, breaking-change, Area-CLI, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.1xx
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add `--framework` option to restore command #37459
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
